page.title: 14Berwick St.James 1st School
page.content: { { The school}used to be next to Berwick Church but moved to its present building in 1937. In 1975 there was a change in this area to the 3-tier educational system of First, Middle and Upper schools, so leaving Berwick with the 5-9 year olds. Closure of the school was feared. In 1977 an {Outdoor Pursuits Centre} was opened at the school. Camping equipment is provided and other Wiltshire schools camp at the site throughout the summer months. This has the dual advantage of enabling the school to remain open and letting the children meet others of their own age as we are normally a tiny, rather isolated community.
